title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: The Great Gatsby is a novel by American writer F. Scott Fitzgerald. Set in the 1920s, the story explores themes of decadence, idealism, resistance to change, and social upheaval.

customer_ratings.review: I absolutely loved this book! The writing is beautiful and the story is captivating.
An interesting read, but I found it a bit slow-paced.
